name: event_log_activity
caption: Event Log Activity
description: Event Log Activity events report actions pertaining to the system's event logging service, such as disabling logging or clearing the log data.

1.caption: Clear
1.description: Clear the event log database, file, or cache.

2.caption: Delete
2.description: Delete the event log database, file, or cache.

actor.description: The actor that performed the activity.
